metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6284 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In LibSass 3.5.5, a heap-based buffer over-read exists in Sass::Prelexer::alternatives in prelexer.hpp.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6284` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-4').
